heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, mixing with rain in the broad valleys; a trace to an inch of snow over high terrain. Highs from the mid 30s to around 40, except low to mid 40s in far southern valleys. South to southwest winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph west of the Greens.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, numerous in the northern mountains, with a trace to 2 inches. Lows in the upper 20s to lower 30s, some mid 30s near Lake Champlain. Southwest winds 5 mph or less, except 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered to numerous snow showers in the mountains, with a trace to 2 inches; scattered snow or rain showers in the valleys, with less than an inch. Highs in the low to mid 40s in the south, and mid 30s to around 40s north, with some lower 30s northeast and in the Adirondacks. West winds 5 to 10 mph.
